title: Can ship into Germany
product: Apple iPhone 7, GSM Unlocked, 32GB - Rose Gold (Renewed)
content: Phone was in near mint condition. Worked without a hitch with my German Vodaphone chip. Also, no problem getting this time shipped into Germany.
author: Amazon Customer
